items.title: Jim Cramer On Procter & Gamble Co. (PG): “I’m Looking To Buy More”
items.description: We recently published a list of Was Jim Cramer’s Call Right on These 10 Stocks? In this article, we are going to take a look at where Procter & Gamble Co. (NYSE:PG) stands against other stocks that Jim Cramer discussed 12 months ago. Back then, the show was heavily focused on the biggest media companies […]
